Package Final.Recipe_book

Class Ingredient

java.lang.Object
Final.Recipe_book.Ingredient
public class Ingredient extends Object
Represents an ingredient with a name and caloric value per cup.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Ingredient(String ingredientName, double caloriesPerCup)
    Constructs a new Ingredient object with specified name and calories per cup.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    addIngredientDefault(String ingredientName, Integer caloriesPerCup)
    Adds a new ingredient to the default list for long-term storage if it does not already exist.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ingredient

      public Ingredient(String ingredientName, double caloriesPerCup)
      Constructs a new Ingredient object with specified name and calories per cup.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient.
      caloriesPerCup - the caloric value per cup of the ingredient.

  • Method Details

    • updateIngredient

      public static void updateIngredient(String ingredientName, Integer caloriesPerCup)
      Updates or adds an ingredient's details in the local list. If the ingredient exists and the calorie count differs, it updates; otherwise, it adds a new ingredient.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient to update or add.
      caloriesPerCup - the new caloric value per cup.

    • addIngredientDefault

      public static void addIngredientDefault(String ingredientName, Integer caloriesPerCup)
      Adds a new ingredient to the default list for long-term storage if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient.
      caloriesPerCup - the caloric value per cup.

    • getIngredientName

      public static String getIngredientName(String ingredientName)
      Retrieves the name of an ingredient from the local list if it exists.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the name of the ingredient or an error message if not found.

    • getCaloriesPerCup

      public static double getCaloriesPerCup(String ingredientName)
      Retrieves the calorie count per cup for an ingredient from the local list if it exists.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient to check.
      Returns:
      the calorie count per cup or -1 if the ingredient is not found.
